name: Super Mega Baseball 2
description: The critically acclaimed Super Mega Baseball series is back with new visuals, deep team and league customization, and online multiplayer modes.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated DX11 NVIDIA or AMD card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Controller required for Pennant Race mode, recommended for all modes
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel i5-2400 or AMD equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 or AMD equivalent, or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space
